KnowledgeItem.Title: JBossWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling packages related to the installation of JBoss by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock JBossWorkflowHandlePKG and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow
